text: The Port of Rio de Janeiro () is a seaport in Rio de Janeiro in Brazil. It is located in a cove on the west shore of Guanabara Bay. The port is managed by Companhia Docas do Rio de Janeiro. As of the 21st century, it is the third busiest port in Brazil. ==References== ==Other websites== *Port of Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro Category:Geography of Rio de Janeiro
title: Port of Rio de Janeiro
